edu.up.cs301.tictactoe
Class TTTState

java.lang.Object
  edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg.GameInfo
      edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg.GameState
          edu.up.cs301.tictactoe.TTTState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TTTState
extends GameState

Contains the state of a Tic-Tac-Toe game. Sent by the game when a player wants to enquire about the state of the game. (E.g., to display it, or to help figure out its next move.)

Version:
July 2013
Author:
Steven R. Vegdahl
See Also:
Serialized Form

Find out which piece is on a square

Parameters:
row - the row being queried
col - the column being queried
Returns:
the piece at the given square; ' ' if no piece there; '?' if it is an illegal square
